data.description:
Updated with every user suggestion at least twice a week for almost an year, Top Features are:

**3D Coverage Everywhere**

‚Ä¢ Almost every recognizable city on earth is available in True 3D, even my tiny town in a poor side of Romania is covered, so you are probably able to visit your own street in 3D

**ChatGPT Integration: The AI companion can**

‚Ä¢ Hear, See and Talk in YOUR OWN Language

‚Ä¢ Visualize & understand your surroundings to teach facts or information about it

‚Ä¢ Teleport you anywhere on earth if asked

‚Ä¢ Help with user interface

**Street View**

‚Ä¢ Best UNCOMPRESSED 8k Quality on the market, with every street 360 on earth and every panorama taken by people

**Realistic Graphics**

‚Ä¢ Real Life Inspired Lighting based on the Customizable Day/Night Cycle

**Multiplayer**

‚Ä¢ With friends

**Hand Tracking**

‚Ä¢ Fly like a Superhero by pointing your index finger

‚Ä¢ Rotate by Steering an Imaginary Steering Wheel

**Terrain Quality**

‚Ä¢ EarthQuest's 3D Map Quality can go much further than anything else out there and achieve realistic 3D by pushing the terrain quality to extreme detail with the best possible performance

**Comfort Settings**

‚Ä¢ Comfort Options ( Snap Turning / Flight Vignette ) to eliminate Motion Sickness

‚Ä¢ Button Remapping ( Flight Controls Range from Simple to Complex Cinematic Flying )

**Google Maps Integration**

‚Ä¢ Smart or manual zoom based on altitude

‚Ä¢ Paired with the compass feature for body orientation

‚Ä¢ Full Google Maps functionality on the Map Window feature

**.. out of space, check "earthquest.site" ..**

changelog.change_log:
---
v34.20 is LIVE !!

- Street View now supports different levels of quality !
( 4k, 8k ) 
This allows users with slower internet speeds enjoy fast & responsive Street View !

- Slightly improved Menu Mini-Map readability

---
v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ
---
v34.03 is out

Bugfix Update

- Fixed 'Random Destination' coordinates not working in other system languages

- Fixed Teleportation not applying "close-to-the-ground" altitude when using some system languages other than English

- Fixed pasting coordinates on the 'Search for Place' not working in other system languages
---

v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ
-
v34.03 is out

Bugfix Update

- Fixed 'Random Destination' coordinates not working in other system languages

- Fixed Teleportation not applying "close-to-the-ground" altitude when using some system languages other than English

- Fixed pasting coordinates on the 'Search for Place' not working in other system languages

v34.02 is RELEASED !!

The powerful new 'Random Destination' feature is now even more powerful !

The function should now always send the user to a 3D Destination ü•≥

And not to worry, the size of available locations is still massive compared to the previous list, with destinations well over a DOZEN !

üéÅ

v33.30 is OUT !!

Was previously slightly wrong about the "bug-free" statement since I just found a bug related to the wind, which I just fixed !

More true-to-life wind volume level
( less noticeably repetitive/unpleasant for a small percentage of users )

Fixed flight-wind bug, where the sound would continue playing if continuously attempting to fly into a surface ( and obviously not moving ).

-
v33.06 is RELEASED !!

Immersion is a top priority in EarthQuest, so let's go ALL IN !

1. Realistic Sun, Sunrises, and Sunsets !!!

- The sun has been completely revamped for realism !
- Sunsets and Sunrises have been overhauled for realism as well, based on real life visuals !
- The sun will now also get occluded by the clouds, just like in real life !

2. More Quality and Performance feedback to help the user more easily achieve their preferred experience

3. Fixed a Street View problem that turned the Mixed Reality view to black while previously using it

v33.05 now released with some more small performance optimizations, an AI interface improvement, and bug fixes.

- If you already own the AI,  you will no longer need to press "Unlock AI", the button will no longer appear from now on  !

- Fixed a Hand Tracking ( Left Handed Mode ) issue that allowed flight even when the user was about to interact with the menu

v33.04 now released with even more performance optimizations and a BIG new keyboard feature that allows :

- Taking any language and foreign text character as input for teleportation 
( some text characters like Chinese ones won‚Äôt appear correctly on the input field due to font limitations but you‚Äôll be able to preview the address separately as you‚Äôre writing it )
- Support for multiple coordinate formats  (  44.244167, 7.769444  or  19¬∞ 38‚Ä≤ 46.00‚Ä≥ N, 37¬∞ 17‚Ä≤ 42.00‚Ä≥ E )
- Taking other copy-paste elements like addresses
- Modifying parts of text ( with cursor )

An one-time pop-up  will appear for everyone explaining how to use it !

v32.50 is OUT IN THE WILD !!

AI. A-I. AI !

The EarthQuest AI is now completely based on the gpt4o infrastructure

- So, that means faster responses, and much smarter AI in every field !!!

- And, if that wasn't good enough.. EVERYONE will now receive DOUBLE the amount of Tokens every few hours !!

Note: the Tokens amount is unlikely to change in the foreseeable future, but may still very slightly change in the future ( less or more ) depending on traffic
